Data.text_description:
The probability of air pressure being high (A=1) is 0.8389. 
For those with air pressure being low (A=0), the probability of rainfall being high (B=1) is 0.5348. 
For those with air pressure being high (A=1), the probability of rainfall being high (B=1) is 0.2420. 
For those with rainfall being low (B=0), the probability of government policies being high (C=1) is 0.4668. 
For those with rainfall being high (B=1), the probability of government policies being high (C=1) is 0.0422. 
For those with rainfall being low (B=0), the probability of job satisfaction being high (D=1) is 0.3790. 
For those with rainfall being high (B=1), the probability of job satisfaction being high (D=1) is 0.8041.
